message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $130.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can meet you at $129, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $129, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $126?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I can meet you at $127, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
